Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Catalyzes an oxidative deamination of predominantly hydrophobic and aromatic L-amino acids, thus producing hydrogen peroxide that may contribute to the diverse toxic effects of this enzyme. This protein has an ability to induce hemolysis and apoptosis.
Sequence Information.PTM: Contains one disulfide bond and N-glycosylated.

Literature.Title: Apoptotic effect in the glioma cells induced by specific protein extracted from Okinawa Habu (Trimeresurus flavoviridis) venom in relation to oxidative stress.
Literature.Author: Sun LK, Yoshii Y, Hyodo A, Tsurushima H, Saito A, Harakuni T, Li YP, Kariya K, Nozaki M, Morine N.

Literature.Title: Characterization of an apoptosis-inducing factor in Habu snake venom as a glycyrrhizin (GL)-binding protein potently inhibited by GL in vitro.
Literature.Author: Abe Y, Shimoyama Y, Munakata H, Ito J, Nagata N, Ohtsuki K.
